meanings.definition: A piece or segment of something
meanings.sent1: She collected different parts of the puzzle to complete it.
meanings.sent2: The car's engine consists of many intricate parts.
meanings.sent3: The parts of the story came together like a jigsaw puzzle.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was like the missing parts of a broken heart.
meanings.sent5: The parts of the flower bloomed beautifully in the sunlight.

meanings.sent1: The parts of the machine work together to function properly.
meanings.sent2: He studied the different parts of the ecosystem in science class.
meanings.sent3: The parts of the recipe blended perfectly to create a delicious dish.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was the essential parts of their happiness.
meanings.sent5: The parts of the orchestra played in harmony during the concert.

meanings.definition: To divide or separate into pieces or sections
meanings.sent1: She parts her hair in the middle every morning.
meanings.sent2: The magician parts the curtain to reveal his final trick.
meanings.sent3: The clouds part to reveal a beautiful blue sky.
meanings.sent4: He parts ways with his old job to pursue a new career.
meanings.sent5: The river parts the forest as it flows through the valley.
